nodes.text: Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures Volume 2
Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures Volume 2 is the second volume in the Clone Wars Adventures series.

Inspired by the Cartoon Network's Clone Wars cartoons, this comic-book series uses the television show as a jumping-off point to tell new stories of heroism and villainy in the same stripped-down visual style.
Take to the skies to battle a deadly armada!
Luminara Unduli and her Padawan Barriss Offee
Lead a small army of clone troopers against the dreaded General Grievous!
Goes solo to foil a sinister Separatist plot!
Incredible action, hot art, and lightning-fast pacing are coming your way in this new take on the Star Wars galaxy.
